definition: there cannot be another one like it
hair/drawing brush/(in the) least/one thousandth/currency unit, 0.1 yuan
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
two/2/(Beijing dialect) stupid
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey
(bound form) fine/delicate

sentences.english: The twin brothers are as like as two peas.
She loves each human the same way.
sentences.chinese: 她毫无二致地爱每个人。

sentences.english: 'We do it exactly the way everybody does in the print media, ' he says.
sentences.chinese: 他说，我们的操作与纸质媒体毫无二致。

definition: exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
to be precisely the same/to be no different
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
not at all the same/substantially different
accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
as different as can be (idiom)/poles apart
widely different/utterly different
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: as different as heaven and earth (idiom)/worlds apart
a complete contrast/totally different
poles apart (idiom)/entirely different
lit. as different as sky and earth (idiom)/fig. night and day difference/opposite extremes/a world of difference/a far cry from
vastly (different)
virtually the same/differing only on small points
